ARABIC: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will say, 'How is it that we do not see some men whom we used to count among the worst of people?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And will add: "O what has happened to us that we do not see the men we counted among the wicked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will say to one another: “But why do we not see those whom we considered him among the wicked?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: But why is it that we cannot see men whom we had considered as wicked
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they say, “What is the matter with us that we do not see the men whom we thought were evil?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they will say: "What is the matter with us that we see not men whom we used to count among the bad ones"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they shall say: What is the matter with us that we do not see men whom we used to count among the vicious?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say, 'How is it with us, that we do not see men here that we counted among the wicked?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: What aileth us that we behold not men whom we were wont to count among the wicked?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And they will say, "How is it that we do not see [here any of the] men whom we used to count among the wicked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they will Say: what aileth us that we behold not men whom we were wont to count among the evil ones?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And they will say, ‘Why is it that we do not see [here] men whom we used to count among the bad ones,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And they will say: "What has happened to us that we see not men whom we used to number among the bad ones?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they will say: "What is the matter with us that we see not men whom we used to count among the bad ones?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And they will say: 'Why do we not see the men that we counted as being among the wicked in here?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they will say, “What is it with us that we do not see men we used to count among the wicked?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they will say, "Why do we not see men whom we used to count among the worst?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:62] And they, the disbelievers of Mecca, say, while they are in the Fire: ‘What is the matter with us that we do not see [here] men whom we used to count, in the world, among the wicked?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they say: What aileth us that we behold not) in the Fire (men) meaning the poor among the believers (whom we were wont to count among the wicked) whom we counted among the lowly and paupers?
